title: [20 YoE, Unemployed, Sales Representative or Sales Manager, United States]
text:
Luba Morson

Salt Lake City, Utah | 555-555-5555 | luba.morson@outlook.com | https://www.linkedin.com/in/luba-morson/

Sales Professional

Accomplished B2B Sales Leader possessing a documented track record of sucessfully selling medical equipment and supplies
across the healthcare continuum, Proficient selling enterprise technology, including Al-powered SaaS platforms for
conversational automation, workflow optimization, and customer experience enhancement. Proven competence in strategic
selling, account management, and complex contract negotiation. Known for exceeding quotas, growing revenue, and building
long-term client relationships. Trusted advisor skilled in aligning solutions to customer KPIs and guiding stakeholders through
complex sales cycles.

Awards and Recognition

e Annual Quota Achiever — Verity Conversational AI, Inc. 2021-2024 | Exceeded quota across Enterprise Al SaaS portfolio.

e Strategic & Digital Accounts Lead — Verity Conversational AI, Inc. 2022 | Led digital transformation initiatives for top-tier clients.

e Sales Innovator — Summit Medical Industries 2013 | Created an e-contract process that accelerated time to close by 300%.

e Corporate Sales Rep of the Year — Summit Medical Industries Corporate Accounts Division 2013 | Top national performer for
adoption and revenue growth.

e Annual Quota Achiever — Summit Medical Industries 2008—2012, 2014—2019 | Consistently surpassed annual revenue goals.

e Leadership Promotions — Recognized for sales performance and talents through progressive leadership promotions:
Sales Rep, Sales Trainer, Regional Manager, Market Sales Director, Critical Accounts CSM, and Management Graduate.

Experience

Aurora Outdoor Lighting Co.
Owner | Salt Lake City, Utah Jun 2024 — Present

Launched and successfully operate an entrepreneurial venture specializing in professional design, installation, and maintenance
of permanent and seasonal outdoor LED lighting. Rapidly identified an underserved market: homeowners needing expert
installation of retail lighting products and quickly established a profitable local business.

e Developed and executed sales and marketing strategies, driving consistent startup revenue.

e Implemented targeted local marketing campaigns via social media, online ads, and referrals to maximizing bookings.

e Manage end-to-end operations, including sales, marketing, quoting, installations, project management, and invoicing.

Verity Conversational AI, Inc.
Customer Success Manager | Palo Alto, CA (Remote) Aug 2021 — May 2024

Transitioned from a successful medical sales and sales management career to embrace a strategic opportunity and gain sales
experience in Al driven SaaS, enterprise solutions. Recruited by Executive leadership to bridge a critical gap between Sales and
Customer Success, ensuring seamless post-sale handoffs, improve client retention, and drive revenue expansion. Committee
Chair tasked to develop and implement scalable workflows via Gainsight CRM. Reduced labor intensive CSM activities by
more than 90% through automation. Role concluded following company-wide reorganization due to funding constraints.

e Proactively drove revenue expansion by identifying sales opportunities within existing accounts, consistently surpassing
quarterly and annual targets by 110%.

e Promoted to Critical Accounts Escalation Manager, managing high-value accounts and leading cross-functional initiatives
to retain key customers, protect margins, and streamline executive communications.

e Led enterprise-wide digital customer success strategy leveraging Gainsight to build automated journey maps,
segmentation, A/B test campaigns, and proactive churn mitigation for 1,000 + customer base.

e Recognized as a Top Performer in Global Customer Success and the first graduate of the company's Management
Development Program, leading a team of four CSMs to attain sales goals and quotas.

e Designed and implemented scalable Customer Success processes, including CRM automation, new hire training, and
onboarding programs, improving efficiency and account management.

Medical Company Name
Market Sales Director | Salt Lake City, UT Jan 2015 — Jul 2021

Directed Northwest Health Group Homecare, Hospice, and Managed Care sales across an 11-state Pacific Northwest region, driving
multimillion-dollar growth and fostering executive-level relationships. Conducted strategic business reviews with C-Suite
executive teams, clinical leadership and inventory management to uncover additional revenue generating opportunities.
Spearheaded sales strategies that consistently exceeded revenue and gross margin goals while optimizing team performance by
leading continual sales training and accountability initiatives.

e Grew regional sales from $10.5M to $27M (2016-2020), maintaining 15.23% average gross margin—more than double the
Post-Acute division average.

e Secured the region's largest Acute Care target, generating $2.3M in new gross margin by employing exceptional sales skills.

e Achieved maximum possible sales growth within the Homecare Division, leading the organization in gross margin
performance 2019—2020.

e Led high-impact sales initiatives including quota setting, rep training, and performance accountability programs to
optimize team output and regional profitability.

Regional Manager | Salt Lake City, UT Jan 2012 — Dec 2014

Managed a team of 10 sales representatives across the Pacific Northwest, while directly overseeing my own territory. Created
two new expansion territories, hired and onboarded sales representatives and implemented strategies to drive regional sales
growth. Conducted field rides, weekly sales progress meetings, and pipeline management to ensure sales quotas were met.

e Directed regional sales team to 128% of assigned quota, while onboarding and coaching two new representatives.

e Implemented focused customer retention activities resulting in less than 8% churn, equating to 120% customer
growth.

e Retained sales team through a personalized management approach, empowering reps to meet customer-specific needs
more effectively freeing them to focus on activities that drove their quota attainment.

e Promoted to “Train the Trainer,” an advanced leadership role mentoring new managers to elevate team performance.

Sales Representative | Salt Lake City, UT Aug 2008 — Dec 2011

Served as Sales Representative for Northern Utah, selling disposable medical supplies and capital equipment to all businesses
within the post-acute industry. Recognized for exceptional customer retention and winning new business by utilizing strong
sales skills and leveraging available resources. Attained consistent growth and leadership promotions by relentlessly seeking to
be an expert in the Post Acute industry, creating lifelong customers and becoming a resourceful innovator within Summit Medical Industries.

e Expanded active account base from 80 declining accounts to 157 growing accounts within two years.

e Grew annual recurring sales from $1.3M to $4.5M, exceeding quota in five out of six years.

e Achieved #1 ranking among U.S. sales representatives for annual promotional sales in 2011.

e Awarded “Best of the West” in 2012 for securing highest payout in quarterly promotional sales.

e Inducted into the Elite $4M sales club for exceptional quota attainment.

e Earned promotions to Sales Trainer in (2009), Regional Manager (2012) and RVP of Homecare (2015).

Education

Bachelor of Arts (B.A.), Technical Sales
Canyon Ridge University, Ogden, UT

Skills

SPIN Selling | Challenger Sales | Customer Profiling | Contract Negotiation | Customer Retention & Satisfaction
Gainsight | Salesforce | CRM Automation | Journey Mapping | New Product Launch & Adoption | Presentation Expert
MS Excel Advanced User | Market Analysis & Growth Strategies | Cross-functional Team Leadership | Closer

Core Competencies

Sales Strategy & Execution | Executive HCP Relationship Management | Consultative & Solution Selling
Strategic Negotiation | Quota Achievement | Strategic Account Planning | Closing New Business
Revenue Growth & Forecasting | Dynamic Presentations | CRM & Data-Driven Sales | Data Analytics
